text:
###  Add
```
POST /api/add
```

Add user to project.

Request:
```javascript
{
    "token": "CB23C3395153D2414CE7FF22F925776DBF72BF309",        /* Login token */
    "username": "Emil",                   /* Username of the person to be added */
    "project": "time_rest"  /* Name of the project where you want to add a user */
}
```
Response success:
```javascript
{
    	"success": true        /* If the action was successful */
	"text": "Emil was added to project: time_rest"
}
```
Response failure:
```javascript
{
    "success": false,
    "text": "User Emil was not found"
}
title: POST add
